riddles.riddle: I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I?
What month of the year has 28 days?
What is full of holes but still holds water?
What question can you never answer yes to?
What is always in front of you but can't be seen?
There's a one-story house in which everything is yellow. Yellow walls, yellow doors, yellow furniture. What color are the stairs?
What can you break, even if you never pick it up or touch it?
What goes up but never comes down?
A man who was outside in the rain without an umbrella or hat didn't get a single hair on his head wet. Why?
What gets wet while drying?
You see a boat filled with people. It has not sunk, but you don't see a single person on the ship. Why?
I shave every day, but my beard stays the same. What am I?
You walk into a room that contains a match, a kerosene lamp, a candle and a fireplace. What would you light first?
A man dies of old age on his 25th birthday. How is this possible?
I have branches, but no fruit, trunk or leaves. What am I?
What can't talk but will reply when spoken to?
The more of this there is, the less you see. What is it?
David's parents have three sons: Snap, Crackle, and what's the name of the third son?
I follow you all the time and copy your every move, but you can't touch me or catch me. What am I?
What has many keys but can't open a single lock?
What has words, but never speaks?
What runs all around a backyard, yet never moves?
What can fill a room but takes up no space?
If you drop me I'm sure to crack, but give me a smile and I'll always smile back. What am I?
The more you take away, the larger it becomes. What is it?
I'm light as a feather, yet the strongest person can't hold me for five minutes. What am I?
I go all around the world but never leave the corner. What am I?
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not alive?
What begins with an E but only has one letter?
What tastes better than it smells?

riddles.riddle: I have a face and two hands, but no arms or legs
I have a ring but no finger
I have a mouse but no tail
I have a screen but I'm not a phone
I'm always cold but never freeze
I capture moments but I'm not a hunter
I have pedals but I'm not a flower
I have dates but I'm not a tree
I have words but never speak
I show countries but never travel
I am a sun in the sky. What phenomenon am I part of?
riddles.hint: Think about weather and celestial bodies

riddles.hint: Think about weather and celestial bodies

riddles.riddle: I have a trunk but I'm not a tree. What am I?
I have a long neck and spots. What am I?
I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have stripes and I'm a big cat. What am I?
I hibernate in winter. What am I?
I can fly high and have sharp talons. What am I?
I'm intelligent and live in the ocean. What am I?
I'm the largest animal on Earth. What am I?
I'm a predator with sharp teeth in the ocean. What am I?
I have eight tentacles. What am I?
I'm the color of fire trucks and roses. What color am I?
I'm the color of the sky and ocean. What color am I?
I'm the color of grass and leaves. What color am I?
I'm the color of the sun and lemons. What color am I?
I'm the color of night and coal. What color am I?
I'm the color of snow and clouds. What color am I?
I'm the color of grapes and royalty. What color am I?
I'm the color of oranges and sunsets. What color am I?
I'm the color of flowers and baby clothes. What color am I?
I'm the color of chocolate and wood. What color am I?
I help people when they're sick. What am I?
I educate children in school. What am I?
I put out fires. What am I?
I enforce the law. What am I?
I cook delicious meals. What am I?
I fly planes. What am I?
I navigate ships. What am I?
I grow crops. What am I?
I conduct experiments. What am I?
I create beautiful paintings. What am I?
